plot: When Sheriff Candidate and markswoman Margaret boards a train On the way to Sunshine Hill. She gets caught up in a good ole train robbery and she aims to stop it. Thankfully she has help in the form five young women, Caroline, the good ole country girl, Janet the proper caring doctor, Alice the feisty rich girl, Helen the sultry Saloon singer , and Laura, the mysterious gunslinger whose skills rival Margaret herself. it's up to these ladies to stop the robbers and and save the cargo.
